none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2016-06-neon-piss/extracted/Neon Piss demo 2010/05 Bullet In The Back

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on June 24, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
I posted this in the early days of The Escape....just a really (no really, a really) good demo from a new band with my pal Greg playing drums. After this demo, NEON PISS would go on to drop the best record of whatever year it came out in. I am fortunate enough to call each member pals, and I have always been genuinely pleased when I see any of them in the flesh. Last time I saw Barker, I was leaving the Fairmont Hotel in SF...walking away from a mundane day at work and seeing that head of fluffy head snoozing in his van waiting to move some rich ass motherfukkr from and/or to one place or another. We talked, and laughed...and I enjoyed his company before I went home. Trying to compartmentalize Barker's passing has been a tough one...great dude, open, gregarious, talented beyond words...just made you glad to know him every time you crossed paths - even if you just knew him casually (as I did). One of my favorite records will now and forever bring me tears... NEON PISS We pull our hoods up so that all the world won't see the fear that drags our feet right back to the liquor store...  ///  They say there's no there here, but I know IT is in the basement spilling onto the sidewalk - IT is in the children as they scream for your blood...
//1.bp.blogspot.com/_UWPI3C1CSoU/TQkGvz8VWPI/AAAAAAAABb0/sKIR3vWfC3E/s1600/neon+piss+cover.jpg
